description.narrative: (Tanzania): Baylor Pediatric AIDS Initiative (BIPAI) provides technical assistance to the National Tuberculosis (TB) & Leprosy Program (NTLP) and delivers services in the Lake and Southern Highland zones with a specific focus on children with TB. This activity aims to: 1) to improve the detection and successful treatment of TB cases among children and adolescents according to the national guidelines and the WHO End TB Strategy; 2) to strengthen diagnostic and clinical management capability and improve national information systems to support TB control; and 3) to engage communities and local authorities to improve ownership and program sustainability. BIPAI's activities align with the U.S. Government's strategic approach to ending TB and the Government of Tanzania's fifth NTLP Strategic Plan (2015-2020).

title.narrative: Performance evaluation of the strengthening pediatric HIV and AIDS services in Tanzania program
Performance evaluation of the strengthening pediatric HIV and AIDS services in Tanzania program
